content: Its very good
I Like It!
I love this app, the neogeo pocket is one of the consoles i ever wanted but i couldn't afford it ðŸ˜«

Some games work fine others just crash at a certain point. Gals fighter hard locks after playing for a few minutes. Pocket tennis refuses to run. Metal slug first mission crashes after a few levels. Mainly the jet fighter when your supposed to exit the jet it crashes. Tried it on another new system same crashes. I wish it would play these games as the pocket didn't have that many games. All other games seem to work fine.

So far so good. I've never used an emulator and this one has been super simple. I got to play an ultra rare game that I'd probably never see in the wild and for that alone its worth the money. All the other fun neo geo games are just icing on the cake. I dont normally emulate unless I have too and I have to give props for this app. Thanks and keep up the good work!
Awesome! When I Tried Sonic Pocket Winter.... (A Hack Of Sonic Pocket Adventure) It Worked!!!! Now I Can Plays As Sonic, Tails, And Knuckles!!!!

Very good app great developer bought multiple emulators from Robert broglia always great I haven't been having any of the problems that's everyone else is having can I suggest to the people having problems with they're roms its not the roms it's where you get them some just don't work I had the same problem with new super Mario on drastic tried another site worked perfectly the best place to download roms for this emulator is coolrom. Com google neogeo pocket roms download do so quickly downloadable roms are being removed slowly but surely online thank you Robert definitely happy with this purchase
audio is broken, developer is not responding

Decent. Some games have a few bugs (trying to play Rockman Battle and Fighters on it results in none of the options consistently working, verified my dump to make sure it wasn't the issue, and I had a random crash in Gals Fighters), but I've also played through most of Biomotor Unitron and SNK vs Capcom Card Fighters Clash with no issues.  also, auto-savestate is still a little iffy and games seem to be a lot more likely to lock up after loading state
Works with Card Fighters and Last Blade so Im happy with it
Of all the games I've tried the only one that doesn't seem to work is Pocket Tennis Color. I've tried ROMs from different sources, but all of them fail to load. A remedy would be superb!
Works perfect and easy to use!
Excellent. Bought it just to play Sonic Pocket adventure.
Love it to play poket king of fighters!
Fast and easy to use. No bios folder loading nothing.  So simple
Now I can pway sanic and lots of classic fighters, puzzle game, and rpgs on my Nvidia shield

I remember the day I bought my NeoGeo Pocket Color. This little system was awesome and now with this emulator I have been brought back to my times with this system. It works flawless and has played every game I have tried! Definite buy!!!
Love it. Have a Neogeo Pocket but not having a front/back light is killer.
Best emulators out there
Works best !!
Every emulator made by this developer is excellent and works fantastic!
A truly excellent NGPC emulator, totally worth the price.   This creator's emulators are all top notch
I have a few questions how u get games on this ive tried all i know. And so far i am not able to
It's at least the best emulator of this long-lost, under-appreciated system I've ever used. Works with all my old roms!

Works great even with all the fast paced fighting games, only one game doesn't work, pocket tennis, once thats fixed it will be a 5 star emu easily worth in the $10 - $15 range, thats how good this emu is...
Amazing emulator. 5 stars. You won't regret this purchase. Awesomeness all around. Multiplayer and cheat support next?
Works perfectly!!!

This man is worth every penny you can throw at him! The emulator he make are all excellent product, are functional from the get go AND are full of little tweaks that make the more hardcore emulation buff please, allow him to customize his game experience.  Color pallet, video mode, aspect ratio and zoom with integer to preserve pixel ratio... This man is reading my mind and allow me to run my games like I want!  I have bought all of his emulator and I suggest you do the same if you need any of the system he support! This review is a general one for all of his product, but honestly it applied to all of the product since I never had a problem with ANY of them!  Enjoy!
Works just like the real thing (and runs better than on the pc). Now I can lose countless hours on card fighter clash, again :-D (running on xperia U)
Works great on xperia play 4G
Words cannot express my satisfaction!
Works flawlessly on xperia play. Loving cardfighters clash, played this loads about 10 years ago, back into again, it's an amazing game.
Its perfect, brings back the old days. By the way other developers drop their projects. This man gives hope!
You can't go wrong with this guys emulators.
Bought on my HTC sensation just so I could play card fighters clash. Works a treat and hassle free. Great emulator
46 years old and playing metal gear solid again, but using the icontrolpad it's just like using a real ngp. Takes me right back to being, er, 34 again! Loving it, great emulator!
Great emulator I love playing capcom vs snk
Loads cardfighters clash. Happy now.

Fantastic effort, updated constantly, developer easy to get in touch with, couldn't ask for more.	Had problems, developer fixed them, Galaxy S2 runs like a dream now.  Kudos to this guy, worth the coinage.
Been waiting 2 years for a Neo Geo Pocket Color emulator. Best money I've spent on the market.

Works perfectly with the Xperia Play - There's even enough space in the tank to keep Spotify running in the background while playing Card Fighters Clash!  While there was an issue with running Flavor's patched English translation of Card Fighter's Clash 2, Robert was quick to respond - providing a solution to working around the problem, and pledging a fix for the next update. You couldn't ask for anything more helpful than that, really.  Give this man your money - it's a great app, just like the others!  (For those after running the latest English CFC2 patch on V1.4.12 - The issue is something to do with the CPU timing during the translator credits/intro. Simply create a save state on the PC version of NeoPop at the game's actual title screen and then move it over to the phone, and you're golden!)
I love being able to play my favorites again. Works perfectly on my Xperia Play! Bravo!
Amazing. I loved playing my NGPC games back in the days. Works very well.
Well done. I had problems running @the beginning but figured it out. Dreams do come true. Cheers!
Worth the 5 bucks the I have two of your emulators both worth it
